List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 playlistalbum (playlisttrack *track, QTreeWidget *parent)
 Constructs a new album with the data in the given playlisttrack The track is also appended to the tracklist.
void addtrack (playlisttrack *)
 add a track to the tracklist,and sort in under this playlistalbum in the tree
void removetrack (playlisttrack *)
 removes a track from the tracklist and the tree The playlisttrack is not deleted, so you have to delete the pointer or append it to an other album
int recalctime ()
 recalculate the time the albumtracks have together.
void setactive (bool)
 Sets this album active.
void bling ()
 This function is called to have the blinging-effect.
void repaintcover (playlisttrack *)
 This function gets called to update the coverpicture of an album, when a playlisttrack is modified.

Detailed Description

This class handles all album-stuff.

int playlistalbum::recalctime (  ) 

recalculate the time the albumtracks have together.

Returns:
the time calculated. If it is 0 delete the album

void playlistalbum::removetrack ( playlisttrack *   ) 

removes a track from the tracklist and the tree The playlisttrack is not deleted, so you have to delete the pointer or append it to an other album

Parameters:
track The track you want to remove
